content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetRequests path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/requests content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
name startdate
desc a lower bound date to search requests for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name enddate
desc an upper bound date to search requests for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name traffictype
in query
required false
desc the type of waf traffic to search requests for
  traffictypeunspecified do not search for a traffic type
  policyblocked search for traffic blocked by policies
  customblocked search for traffic blocked by rules
  legit search for traffic passed to the origin
  customwhitelisted search for traffic allowed by rules
  policywhitelisted search for traffic allowed by policies
schema
type str
default traffictypeunspecified
sum get all requests
responses
200
wafgetrequestsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
wafrequest
type obj
props
id
type str
desc the waf requests unique identifier
path
type str
desc the path of the requested url
clientip
type str
desc the originating ip address
wafhttpmethod
type str
default methodunspecified
desc http methods of a request

 methodunspecified unspecified http method
  get http get method
  post http post method
  put http put method
  delete http delete method
  head http head method
  patch http patch method
  options http options method
  connect http connect method
  trace http trace method
rulename
type str
desc the name of the waf rule triggered by the request
country
type str
desc the iso 31661 alpha2 code of the country where the request originated from
wafrequestaction
type str
default actionunspecified
desc the actions that the waf takes when a request triggers a waf rule

 actionunspecified the waf performed an unspecified action with the request
  block the waf blocked the request
  allow the waf allowed the request
  captcha the waf presented the user with a captcha
  handshake the waf performed automatic browser validation
  monitor the waf monitored the request but took no action
ruleid
type str
desc the unique id of the waf rule that triggered the action against the request
useragent
type str
desc the full user agent string for the request
useragentclient
type str
desc the name of the requesting client typically the name of the requesting web browser
organization
type str
desc the organization that owns the requests originating ip address according to a whois lookup
requesttime
type str
format datetime
desc when the waf request occurred
referenceid
type str
desc the requests userfacing identifier

reference ids are displayed to the end user when the waf blocks a request to a site please note that a requests id and reference id are different
statuscode
type str
desc the http status code of the request
wafrequestresult
type str
default challengerequestresultunspecified
desc the requests end result

 challengerequestresultunspecified the result is undetermined
  passed the request is passed to origin
  blocked the request is blocked by waf
traffictypes
type str
desc the kinds of traffic in the request flagged by the waf
desc a request that was inspected by the waf
desc the requested information about a waf sites requests
desc the requested waf requests
title: 20_Requests_GetRequests_110.json
